author: igv4321
body:
Includuing HBHENegativeEFilter, HBHEPulseShapeFlagSetter and HBHEStatusBitSetter functionality in the Phase 1 HB/HE code.

Refactoring python configs so that HBHEPulseShapeFlagSetter and HBHEStatusBitSetter configurations remain the same for QIE8 readouts for both Phase 1 and legacy reco module.
title: Adding status bit setters for Phase 1 HB/HE reco
